sentence.Network_en: Try to orientate your students towards the science subjects.
sentence.Network_cn: 把学生的兴趣尽力引导到理科方面.

sentence.Network_en: Anxiety comes from not being able to orientate yourself in your own existence.
sentence.Network_cn: 不能适应生活便会产生焦虑。

sentence.Network_en: The explorer climbed a tree in order to orientate himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位勘探者为了确定他所在的地点爬到了一颗树上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以o开头的英语英文单词 ... organize 组织，编组 orientate 定...位；给...定位 oriented 有向的，定向的.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... hyphenate 加连字符 orientate 使向东，定方向 differentiate 区别.

list.abs: 方字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 方位词〖 nounoflocality〗 方向〖 direction;orientation〗 方形〖 square〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... oriental n 东方人 orientation n 定向，定位 disorient v 使迷失方向.
瑞士名表排行_爱问知识人 ... 西铁城 Citizen 东方(双狮) ORIENT 卡西欧 CASIO.
为了让东方表(ORIENT)品牌能与世界市场接轨, 在未来的数年中, 双狮牌, 双狮表, 东方双狮表等别名将会渐渐地淡化直到完全不再使用。
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... orient 东方 oriental 东方的 origin 起源.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: probably a back-formation from orientation

means.word_mean: 1. determine one's position with reference to another point

auth_sentence.content: The ball has bells inside it to help to orientate the players and, as a result, the game is played in total silence.

means.word_mean: 朝向；面向；确定方向；使适应

sentences.en: Try to orientate your students towards the science subjects.
sentences.cn: 把学生的兴趣尽力引导到理科方面。

sentences.en: to orientate yourself to a new situation
He orientated himself by finding a familiar landscape.
sentences.cn: 他寻见一处熟悉的景色,从而确定自己所处的方位。
